title: The 9 Most Difficult Courses in America
headline: The 9 Most Difficult Courses in America - And What You Would Shoot There
description: Take a trip through our rogues gallery of the toughest, meanest, most demanding courses in the country and find out what the average handicapper (a 16) would be happy to shoot there -- on a good day!
